summary: The diff adds a React/Tailwind single-page landing page skeleton with topic cards and a sticky nav, plus substantial authentication/actor/query scaffolding and a backend file. Some key BuildRequest details (anchor-based nav and exact footer text/content) are not fully evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use an anchor-based navigation bar with in-page anchors to the exact section IDs (#share, #trading, #ecommerce, #dropshipping, #importexport).
missing_requirements.reason: Navigation is implemented with <button> elements and a scrollIntoView handler rather than anchor links (e.g., <a href="#share">). This does not match the explicit 'anchor-based navigation bar' requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer text shows exactly: ‚Äú¬© 2026 Business Awareness | Learn ‚Ä¢ Grow ‚Ä¢ Succeed‚Äù.
missing_requirements.reason: The landing page file is truncated before any footer is shown; no footer implementation/text is visible in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include five visible content cards with the same headings and paragraph content as the user-provided HTML.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the first card is fully visible and it includes an emoji in the title ("üìà Share Market"). The remaining cards/content are truncated, so matching the exact provided HTML content cannot be verified from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hook and related actor creation logic (authentication scaffolding).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly state no authentication (Internet Identity) flow is required, yet the app is wrapped with InternetIdentityProvider and adds useInternetIdentity/useActor hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client/provider setup for backend queries.
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend canister APIs/queries are not required for this static page, but QueryClientProvider is added and query invalidation/refetch logic exists.
BuildRequest states backend changes are not required for this static page, but backend/main.mo is added.
